badge_style_instruction: A gritty, ultra-realistic color photograph in the style of film noir. I want a color badge photo for sheriff. The texture of the concrete, fabric and wood is palpable. All sholuld be highly detailed 8k.
name: Sheriff Hank Mercer
mugshot_prompt: Sheriff badge photo shot (studio product photo) of a Dawsonville Sheriff badge pinned to a dark navy uniform chest, crisp gold metal texture, engraved text, subtle reflections, centered composition, shallow depth of field, neutral gray background, photorealistic, highly detailed 8k.
